title: Litro to distribute 16,000 LP gas cylinders tomorrow
body_lines: Litro Gas Lanka Limited, the primary liquefied petroleum gas supplier in Sri Lanka, says it plans to distribute 16,000 gas cylinders (12.5kg, 5kg and 2.3kg) in the country tomorrow (June 03).
The details of LP gas dealers where the consumers can purchase cylinders tomorrow will be updated on the official website of Litro Gas - www.litrogas.com
